short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A helpful extension for Salesforce users. Add API names of object's fields to the page, making it easier to identify fields

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:

The Salesforce API Name Assistant is a powerful Chrome extension designed to streamline and simplify the lives of Salesforce users and administrators. It revolutionizes the way you work with Salesforce objects by effortlessly adding API names to object fields with just one click. Say goodbye to the tedious and time-consuming task of manually assigning API names to fields; this extension does it for you in a matter of seconds.

Key Features:

Instant API Name Generation: With a single click, the Salesforce API Name Assistant generates API names for all the fields within a Salesforce object. No more inspection and lots of tabs opened anymore to check manually for field names.


Benefits:

Time Savings: The Salesforce API Name Assistant dramatically reduces the time it takes to set up API names for your Salesforce fields, allowing you to focus on more important tasks.

Data Consistency: Ensure consistency in your Salesforce database by following a standardized naming convention for API names.

Reduced Errors: Minimize the risk of errors associated with manual API name creation, enhancing data accuracy.

User Empowerment: Empower Salesforce users of all levels with a user-friendly tool that eliminates the need for complex coding or development skills.

Compatibility:

The Salesforce API Name Assistant is compatible with all major Chrome browsers and seamlessly integrates with your Salesforce environment, providing a hassle-free experience for users. We support both Classic and Lightining, and Custom and Standard objects

Get Started Today:

Make your Salesforce data management more efficient and error-free with the Salesforce API Name Assistant. Say goodbye to manual API name creation and streamline your Salesforce processes. Add the extension today to experience the future of Salesforce object field management.
